title: Data Import Plan
description: Schema for SFDX Toolbelt's data import plan JSON.

items.title: SObject Type
items.description: Definition of records to be insert per SObject Type

sobject.title: Name of SObject
sobject.description: Child file references must have SObject roots of this type

saveRefs.title: Save References
saveRefs.description: Post-save, save references (Name/ID) to be used for reference replacement in subsequent saves.  Applies to all data files for this SObject type.

resolveRefs.title: Resolve References
resolveRefs.description: Pre-save, replace @<reference> with ID from previous save.  Applies to all data files for this SObject type.

files.title: Files
files.description: An array of files paths to load

items.title: Filepath.
items.description: Filepath string or object to point to a JSON or XML file having data defined in SObject Tree format.

file.title: Filepath schema
file.description: Filepath to JSON or XML file having data defined in SObject Tree format

contentType.title: Filepath schema.
contentType.description: If data file extension is not .json or .xml, provide content type.

saveRefs.title: Save References
saveRefs.description: Post-save, save references (Name/ID) to be used for reference replacement in subsequent saves.  Overrides SObject-level 'saveRefs' setting.

resolveRefs.title: Resolve References
resolveRefs.description: Pre-save, replace @<reference> with ID from previous save.  Overrides SObject-level 'replaceRefs' setting.
